current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the
		  reproductive assistance provided by the Department of Veterans Affairs to
		  severely wounded, ill, or injured veterans and their spouses, and for other
		  purposes.
